recommendations: Antonio Silveira
Vice President, Software Engg - Building products that help Small Businesses succeed online. I'm hiring, join me!
November 19, 2016, Antonio reported directly to Raj

I had the privilege of working with Raj at GoDaddy, he is one of the hardest working leader I have ever worked with, setting the example and a high bar for any organization. As a leader, Raj is incredibly focus on customer success. He understands that if you do the right  thing for your customers the business results will follow.I remember that several times we were on taxi cabs or restaurants and Raj was always wanting to know more on how these users operate, what are their needs, what was missing for the products they use.Raj moves fast, but he also a great listener and more importantly, he acts on feedback and makes changes when needed. I learned so much when I was part of Raj's organization and I can say that I am better at my work because of that experience.

I have no hesitation in recommending Raj having worked closely with him over a period of approximately 3 years.  His professionalism and attention to detail are an asset to any team and his ability to deliver against high pressure timescales, at scale is what any field sales organisation will truly value.  Raj has a unique technical and commercial accumen that allows him to understand real customer, partner and field issues, align them to a solution that works for everyone and engage the right level of resource to drive a win-win result.  He is a truly passionate, honest and highly valued colleague.

Endorsed by 10 of Raj’s colleagues at GoDaddy
summary: More than 14 years of experience bringing innovative products and technology to millions of users mostly in enterprise and SMB space by leading product teams globally. Led product management teams to drive all aspects of product management - from market opportunity analysis to product vision to product definition to product roadmap to driving product execution. Led product marketing team to drive GTM strategies for many products e.g., Office 365 and all of the GoDaddy Presence and Commerce suite of products. My goals are simple: •	Taking products to market that delights 10’s of millions of customers worldwide•	Helping everyone I work with achieve their personal and professional dreams while we work on delighting customers•	Working on making markets and disrupting status quoA few professional accomplishments in the last decade:Microsoft      - Worked on 1st version of Exchange online and making it mainstream (part of Microsoft's 1st enterprise team to crack Saas)      - Worked on 1st version of Office 365 (bringing Office 365 to market)Google      - Managed scaling Google Apps to millions of users (from product management to monetization)GoDaddy- Turning around an organization and building a "product" first culture that is focused on delighting SMBs Specialties: People Management, General management, Organization leadership, Cross-group collaboration, Project management, Cloud computing, SaaS, Product management, Business strategy, Competitive analysis, Digital Advertising, Search, partnerships, Internet Domains
name: Raj Mukherjee
title: Technology Executive - helping people get their dream job
